comments.content:
Detailed Report: https://oss-fuzz.com/testcase?key=6014843229962240

Project: libxml2
Fuzzing Engine: afl
Fuzz Target: xml
Job Type: afl_asan_libxml2
Platform Id: linux

Crash Type: Heap-use-after-free READ 8
Crash Address: 0x61500003d618
Crash State:
  xmlFreeNodeList
  xmlXIncludeDoProcess
  xmlXIncludeProcessTreeFlagsData
  
Sanitizer: address (ASAN)

Recommended Security Severity: High

Regressed: https://oss-fuzz.com/revisions?job=afl_asan_libxml2&range=202204020601:202204030612

Reproducer Testcase: https://oss-fuzz.com/download?testcase_id=6014843229962240

Issue filed automatically.

See https://google.github.io/oss-fuzz/advanced-topics/reproducing for instructions to reproduce this bug locally.
When you fix this bug, please
  * mention the fix revision(s).
  * state whether the bug was a short-lived regression or an old bug in any stable releases.
  * add any other useful information.
This information can help downstream consumers.

If you need to contact the OSS-Fuzz team with a question, concern, or any other feedback, please file an issue at https://github.com/google/oss-fuzz/issues. Comments on individual Monorail issues are not monitored.

This bug is subject to a 90 day disclosure deadline. If 90 days elapse
without an upstream patch, then the bug report will automatically
become visible to the public.

> Regressed: https://oss-fuzz.com/revisions?job=afl_asan_libxml2&range=202204020601:202204030612

A local git-bisect reveals that this regressed with the following commit:
<https://gitlab.gnome.org/GNOME/libxml2/-/commit/7618a3b15947cd28a060bde24992f8a96256d7d4>

```
$ git bisect good
7618a3b15947cd28a060bde24992f8a96256d7d4 is the first bad commit
commit 7618a3b15947cd28a060bde24992f8a96256d7d4
Author: Nick Wellnhofer <>
Date:   Sun Feb 6 21:11:38 2022 +0100

    Make xmlStaticCopyNode non-recursive

 tree.c | 41 +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++--
 1 file changed, 39 insertions(+), 2 deletions(-)
```

ClusterFuzz testcase 6014843229962240 is verified as fixed in https://oss-fuzz.com/revisions?job=afl_asan_libxml2&range=202204100605:202204110606

If this is incorrect, please file a bug on https://github.com/google/oss-fuzz/issues/new

This bug has been fixed. It has been opened to the public.

- Your friendly Sheriffbot
